About this Site

This site is an HTML export of some of my org-mode notes. Org-mode is a literate-programming environment; within Emacs I can execute the code blocks on this site interactively.

The source code is spread out among a couple personal repos: articles, cloudformation, site, cfclrk.github.io, and some org-mode configuration in dotfiles.
